import { Box, Button } from '@mui/material'; import React from 'react'; import SelectLabelsSingle from './components/selectBox'; // Assuming the select box is for the single room import { WovenImageList } from './components/ImageList'; // Assuming this is the image gallery for the single room import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function BookNowSingle() { return ( {/* Header Section */}

E-Just Hotel Guest House

 {/* Select Labels for Room Type */} {/* Single Room Description */}

Single Room

Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette, which has an oven, a microwave, a tea and coffee maker, and a toaster. The spacious room features air conditioning, a minibar, a terrace with a quiet street view as well as a private bathroom boasting a bath. The unit has 1 bed.

{/* Facilities Section for Single Room */}

Facilities of E-Just Hotel Borg El Arab

Most popular facilities:

  • Room service
  • Free parking
  • Facilities for disabled guests
  • Free Wifi
  • Non-smoking rooms
  • Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms
  • Breakfast

 {/* Booking Table with Images */}

Booking Details

{/* Show images for the Single Room under the table */} ); } export default BookNowSingle;
